LoginSqlTemplate.GetUserInfo: SELECT ID,USERNAME,ACCOUNT FROM USER_TABLE where ACCOUNT=:ACCOUNT and PASSWORD=:PASSWORD and status=1

MemberSqlTemplate.GetMemberData: SELECT ID,USERNAME,ACCOUNT,TEL,STATUS FROM USER_TABLE where id<>1
MemberSqlTemplate.UpdMemberData: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET USERNAME=:USERNAME,TEL=:TEL WHERE ID=:ID
MemberSqlTemplate.UpdPassword: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET PASSWORD=:PASSWORD WHERE ID=:ID
MemberSqlTemplate.UpdStatus: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET STATUS=:STATUS WHERE ID=:ID

LeaveSqlTemplate.GetLeaveData: select L_ID as ID,S_DATE StartTime,E_DATE EndTime,TYPE,Status,remark from leave where USER_ID=:USER_ID

AppSettings.Secret: THIS IS USED TO SIGN AND VERIFY JWT TOKENS, REPLACE IT WITH YOUR OWN SECRET, IT CAN BE ANY STRING
